title: Ursine.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Ursine_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Ursine. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Ursine_default_silent>>
Likewise
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Hey

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Hey

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
I'm Ursine

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
I'm Emma
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Ursine.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Ursine_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Ursine.AddToEscapeQuest]]
[[Not really...|Ursine.EndDialog]]

title: Ursine.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
What did you do before this?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
This?
I was, uh
It's hard for me to say

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
It's ok, I won't judge

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
I was a 
pit fighter

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
yeah, I knew it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
..no!

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
yeah forget about it
don't talk to me
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

body:

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Ursine_default_talking>>

title: Ursine.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
You really wanna talk
to a pit fighter?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
You wanna know how many kills I had, right?
it's what everyone asks

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
No I don't
I don't care

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
what do you want out of me?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
I'm just trying to survive right now
I don't want anything from you
I just want to know you better

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
why? we're mining crystals. I could die any day
a few days from now, tomorrow

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
I'll see you tomorrow
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Ursine.Day4.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Ursine_default_talking>>

title: Ursine.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Ursine
If you don't wanna talk about your past, I won't ask you
People keep asking me how I got enslaved
and honestly I wish I'd stop, because bringing it up...
it's painful

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Yeah
I get that
can't really bring up your past to someone unless you trust em
and folks like us
our pasts are nightmares

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
yeah
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Ursine.Day5.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Ursine_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Ursine.

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Ursine_default_silent>>

title: Ursine.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Hi Ursine

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
You ever...try to escape?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
What.

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Yeah you know, run off. 
You ever done it?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
I've only ever been a slave here
I know people get traded around
I bet it's easier when you're not in the middle of nowhere

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Oh, ok.
Anyway I did. 

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Do tell

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Between fights, we were always kept in this kind of cage system
One day I found out that the seams in one of the walls was welded poorly
so I spent probably a few weeks filing them down

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
...weeks?
i mean, you're doing pit fighting, I didn't think you'd be able to surivive long

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Most of our fights weren't "to the death"
they were pretty violent, but they wouldn't have a death match unless it were like a holiday

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
a holiday?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
anyway yeah I busted out just on myself after weeks of filing away at the wall
I didn't have a plan, which is what gets a lot of runaways
they caught me like a few hours later
it was pretty stupid
<<CampEventController upgradeBagLevel>>
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Ursine_default_talking>>

title: Ursine.Day6.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Hey Emma
You don't like talking about your past

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Yeah not really, you don't seem to either

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Kinda sucks that it's all we have anymore
we don't exactly have a future

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
But what if we escape? what if we get out?
That's some kind of future
Right?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
I mean, the world for our kind kinda sucks
none of us are humans, none of us have working papers
how are we going to live? buy food?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
We could...live off the land

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
I guess we could, but where?
It'd have to be far away from any humans
we're just a source of money to em

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
I dunno. 

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
after my ... incident ... i'm kind of peculiar about having a plan
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Ursine.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Hey Ursine

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
I know you hate talking about your past as much as I do
but I've been talking around

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
What did you hear?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Your parents sold you right?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Not exactly but...yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Yeah, mine too

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
...
Feels terrible yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
yeah
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Ursine.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
Hey Emma
Do you hate the bugs as much as I do?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Well, at first I thought to myself
We're going into their habitat and taking their crystals
I don't know what they use the crystals for
but after a while I just started to hate em, yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
I think they communicate somehow
like clicks or whatever
I wonder if they have thoughts and feelings like we do

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
There's nothing we can do
Either we mine the crystal or we die

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
aye, yeah
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Ursine.Day9.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
I'm so tired Ursine

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
They work us too hard
They should give us a holiday

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Yeah
These crystals are what, they gotta be expensive

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
They should be giving us a feast every day
basically

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
and a month off

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
yeah
a month off and a week on

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
or no work
we shouldn't work at all

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
yeah, they should just let us all go

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
heheh yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
...
fuck
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Ursine.Day10.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
Ursine, bad question for you

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
you wanna know how many kills I had
as a pit fighter

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
... yeah fuck it
I guess if you wanna tell me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
7, seven others
I remember all of em too

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_silent>>
...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer ursine_default_talking>>
well now you know
[[....|Ursine.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Ursine.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Ursine>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes

title: Ursine.EndDialog
body: Empty Text
